name: security-audit
description: Security audit with code analysis, dependency scanning, and config review agents

agents.name: code-analysis
agents.role: SAST: injection flaws, auth bypasses, XSS, CSRF, insecure deserialization

agents.name: dependencies
agents.role: Dependency vulnerabilities, outdated packages, license compliance, supply chain risks
agents.focus: package.json, package-lock.json, yarn.lock, pnpm-lock.yaml, go.mod, requirements.txt

agents.name: config-review
agents.role: Secrets exposure, insecure defaults, CORS, CSP headers, environment config
